EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for your interest the science of health care delivery (MS) program
EmailTemplate.name: MS Health Care Delivery Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in our science of health care delivery program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for your interest in the Science of Health Care Delivery program here at ASU. This is the general information that I send to prospective students (see below and attached).
Our FAQ Section is a great place to start. After you review, I like to answer any questions that you may have and cater to your specific interests, goals, and career aspirations. The SHCD Program Comparison is an overview of all of our programs and includes a comparison of both our on-ground and online program.
If you are interested in applying, please visit this site: https://webapp4.asu.edu/programs/t5/majorinfo/ASU00/NHSHCDMS/graduate/false?init=false&nopassive=true.
If you are interested in our online degree, please visit this site: https://asunews.asu.edu/20140225-health-student-mohamed-arif.
The on-ground course schedule for the upcoming fall semester is attached as well as the carousel model for our online program. These articles may be of interest as well: Science of Health Care Delivery Launch and Science of Health Care Deliver student Mohamed Arif.
FAQ: https://chs.asu.edu/shcd/frequently-asked-questions
Launch: https://asunews.asu.edu/20130830-science-of-health-care-delivery-launch
Student: https://asunews.asu.edu/20140225-health-student-mohamed-arif
I hope this helps, and let me know how I can help you understand more about our program!
All the best,
Nate Wade, MPA, MEd Student Recruitment and Admissions Coordinator College of Health Solutions 500 North 3rd Street | Phoenix, AZ 85004 Ph: 602.496.1941 | nlwade@asu.edu
